item.title: LangChain demo: Chat with Tesla Earnings Deck
item.description: Since LangChain seems like a fairly powerful way to recursively call OpenAI LLMs, I wanted to understand how this dark magic worked. I came accross this gist by @virattt where he creates a simple chatbot to chat with a Facebook earnings PDF. This seemed like a good place to start. I created my own adaptation that reproduces the simple chatbot, but this time talking with the Tesla Q1 2023 earnings deck.
